languages.text: Ценой невероятных жертв людям удается добыть с десяток голов. Друкари теряют интерес к миру и покидают систему.
After exorbitant losses, the people claim a dozen xenos heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.
languages.original_text: Ценой невероятных жертв людям удается добыть с десяток голов. Друкари теряют интерес к миру и покидают систему.

traits.locale_text: After exorbitant losses, the people claim a dozen xenos heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.
After exorbitant losses, the people deliver a dozen heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.
After exorbitant losses, the people claim a dozen xenos heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.
After exorbitant losses, the people deliver a dozen heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.

After exorbitant losses, the people claim a dozen xenos heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.

After exorbitant losses, the people claim a dozen xenos heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.
After exorbitant losses, the people claim a dozen xenos heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.

languages.text: Après avoir subi des pertes considérables, les habitants massacrent une douzaine de xénos. Les Drukharis perdent tout intérêt pour la colonie et quittent le système.
languages.original_text: After exorbitant losses, the people claim a dozen xenos heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir subi des pertes considérables, les habitants massacrent une douzaine de xénos. Les Drukharis perdent tout intérêt pour la colonie et quittent le système.

languages.text: 多大な損失を出した後、民衆は十数の異種族の首を討ち取った。デュカーリは興味を失い、この星系を去った。
languages.original_text: After exorbitant losses, the people claim a dozen xenos heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.

traits.locale_text: 多大な損失を出した後、民衆は十数の異種族の首を討ち取った。デュカーリは興味を失い、この星系を去った。

languages.text: 行星的居民付出了惨重的伤亡之后，割下了十几颗异形的脑袋。黑暗灵族失去了兴趣，离开了这个星系。
languages.original_text: After exorbitant losses, the people claim a dozen xenos heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.

traits.locale_text: 行星的居民付出了惨重的伤亡之后，割下了十几颗异形的脑袋。黑暗灵族失去了兴趣，离开了这个星系。

languages.text: Tras sufrir bajas abrumadoras, la gente se cobra una docena de cabezas xenos. Los Drukhari pierden el interés y abandonan el sistema.
languages.original_text: After exorbitant losses, the people claim a dozen xenos heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.

traits.locale_text: Tras sufrir bajas abrumadoras, la gente se cobra una docena de cabezas xenos. Los Drukhari pierden el interés y abandonan el sistema.

languages.text: Nach exorbitanten Verlusten trennen die Leute einem Dutzend Xenos die Köpfe ab. Die Drukhari verlieren das Interesse und verlassen das System.
languages.original_text: After exorbitant losses, the people claim a dozen xenos heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.

traits.locale_text: Nach exorbitanten Verlusten trennen die Leute einem Dutzend Xenos die Köpfe ab. Die Drukhari verlieren das Interesse und verlassen das System.

languages.text: Halk, çok sayıda kayıp verildikten sonra on kadar zenonun kellesini alıyor. İlgisini kaybeden Drukhariler sistemi terk ediyor.
languages.original_text: After exorbitant losses, the people claim a dozen xenos heads. The Drukhari lose interest and leave the system.
